title: AI Specialist Needed to Create Hyper-Realistic Photos
job_overview:
Job Description:

We're looking for a talented and experienced AI Specialist to help us create hyper-realistic product images for our brand. If you're skilled at generating lifelike visuals using AI tools and have a strong understanding of e-commerce and advertising, we want to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:

Generate high-quality, realistic product images for our brand, ensuring they reflect the highest industry standards.
Work with our team to understand our needs and translate them into stunning, photorealistic visuals.
Deliver final images in various formats that can be used across digital platforms (website, social media, ads, etc.).
Apply knowledge of e-commerce and ads to create product photos that align with marketing strategies and drive sales.
Requirements:

Proficiency in AI-based image generation tools.
Experience creating hyper-realistic product photos, including but not limited to product shots, textures, lighting, and shadows.
A strong understanding of e-commerce and advertising to ensure images are optimized for sales and marketing purposes.
Ability to follow precise instructions and deliver creative results.
A strong portfolio showcasing your past work (please include a link in your application).
Your contact number, so we can easily reach out to you.
Pay:

You can earn up to $3 per hour based on experience and quality of work.
How to Apply:

In your application, please provide a portfolio of AI-generated product photos you've worked on.
Include your phone number to facilitate easy communication.
Include the phrase "I READ THIS!!" in your job post title to ensure that you've read the full job description and understand the application process.
